description: This file provides helper functions for configuring OAuth 2.0 flows with Atlassian products (JIRA and Confluence). It pulls configuration data from environment variables, ensuring sensitive data is not hardcoded, and offers functions to retrieve base URLs, OAuth client configurations, and frontend redirect URLs.

methods.name: str get_atlassian_base_url()
methods.description: Returns the base URL of the Atlassian Cloud site, fetched from environment variables.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] get_jira_oauth_config()
methods.description: Returns a dictionary containing Jira OAuth 2.0 configuration, including client ID, secret, redirect URI, and base URL, all retrieved from environment variables.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] get_confluence_oauth_config()
methods.description: Returns a dictionary with Confluence OAuth 2.0 configuration, defaulting to Jira's config if Confluence-specific environment variables are not set.

methods.name: str get_frontend_base_url_default()
methods.description: Returns the frontend base URL used for redirect after authentication, fetched from environment variables.
